DOC.brief_summary: The present proposal is designed to examine the effect of carbohydrate and protein co-ingestion on muscle protein synthesis during endurance type exercise activities. We hypothesize that muscle protein synthesis is higher when protein is co-ingested during exercise.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Nutrition on Muscle Protein Synthesis
DOC.criteria: recreationally endurance trained BMI > 25 kg/m2 Not physically active
